title: BONUS EPISODE - Dr. Treva B. Lindsey On 'America Goddam' + Serena Williams
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Dr. Treva B. Lindsey sat down with Ebro in the Morning on her book 'America Goddam' and have a great discussion on how Black women are treated in this country, how Serena Williams was not believed when it came to the pain experienced before the birth of her child, and much more! 

LISTEN TO HOT 97's NEWEST PODCAST "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923
